description:
* A new adaptation of http://anidb.net/cr1017 [Suzue Miuchi]`s manga Glass No Kamen. The original story dates back 1976 when Miuchi serialised it in Hakusensha`s Hana to Yume Magazine. Mask Of Glass was made into a TV anime in 1984 and then later into an OAV series in 1998.
Her father passed away very early and her mother lives and works in a crowded Chinese restaurant. Kitajima Maya, a 13-year old girl, has to carry the burden of making ends meet as she fights against her ill fate. However, she is able to overcome the trials and tribulations in her life with her passion and enthusiasm. She happens to encounter the reclusive actress Tsukikage who decides to train and mould her into the foremost actress of her generation.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Life so far for Kitajima Maya has been rough. One day she gets a small part in a school play and now her life has suddenly turned around.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sen no Kamen o Motsu Shoujo
The Girl Who Has a Thousand Masks

REGULAR.description:
Tsukikage makes arrangements for Maya to transfer to another school; she also starts training her to become an actress.
Source: crunchyroll

Kazehaya asks Sawako to meet him after school to discuss her study habits and for help with his homework. The other students learn she is a great teacher and she starts helping out her other classmates.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya asks Tsukikage if she can work her way through acting school. Tsukikage agrees to give her a scholarship to the Tsukikage Acting Troupe.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsukikage gives the girls a new acting assigment which is to do a play only using four words. That night Ayumi shows up at Tsukikage`s class and participates in the lesson by acting as Tsukikage`s "assistant".
Source: crunchyroll

Tsukikage told the class their new play will be "Little Women" and Maya has been cast as the third sister, Beth. Maya now has to live as Beth for a week in order to better understand her role.
Source: crunchyroll

All the critics show up to review the Tsukikage`s Acting Troupe`s first play. Maya receives a bouquet of purple roses from her first fan.
Source: crunchyroll

The investors visit Tsukikage after her release from the hospital and tell her she has to enter the upcoming acting competition in Nagoya.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsukikage Acting Troupe finds out the Ondine Troupe is also performing Takekurabe and that Ayumi will be Midori. The troupe starts rehearsals and Tsukikage really pushes Maya. This causes Maya to create her role and to make her own Midori.
Source: crunchyroll

The Tsukikage Acting Troupe and Ondine Troupe will go head to head in today`s competition.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: たけくらべ 二人の美登利

REGULAR.description:
Tsukikage Acting Troupe is again favored to win in the National Acting Competition. The night before their competition someone destroys all of their props and costumes.
Source: crunchyroll

Since the cast does not return in time for the competition, Maya volunteers to perform solo.
Source: crunchyroll

The girls ask Tsukikage if she will still teach them acting now that the troupe has been disbanded. Sakurakouji tries to persuade Maya to join is acting troupe.
Source: crunchyroll

Ayumi vows to take any role possible. The schools` acting troupe is putting on a new production. When the lead actress has to be rushed to the emergency room, Maya volunteers to tackle the role.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya gets a role with another troupe after impressing them with her audition. The girl whose spot Maya took has something up for sleeve for Maya.
Source: crunchyroll

Miss Harada informs Tsukikaga that they will never hire Maya again eventhough they know whe will take the stage by storm one day. Maya auditions for "Wuthering Heights."
Source: crunchyroll

As more people see the play during it`s run, the audience is becoming more confused because the younger actors play with much more intensity than their adult actors. Due to this the play receives bad reviews.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsukikage pulls the troupe together to perform the play "The Stone`s Smile" with Maya in the role of the doll. On the 10th days of performances they are a sell out.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya loses her concentration during the play thus causing her to lose her mask as she is thinking about her Mom she just saw on the street.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya goes on stage when called eventhough she does not know her lines as someone switched her script.
Source: crunchyroll

All the girls auditioning for the role spend the summer rehearsing for their chance to play Helen Keller.
Source: crunchyroll

The judges pick both Maya and Ayumi to be Helen and they will alternate who plays Helen during the run.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Miracle Worker, the Final Audition
奇跡の人 最終審査

REGULAR.description:
Ayumi and Maya both perform their versions of Helen for the Theater Festival; Ayumi is first to perform.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 対決! 二人のヘレン

REGULAR.description:
After Maya accepts the award for Best Supports Actress Tsukikage comes onstage and offers both Maya and Ayumi the chance to play the lead role in "The Scarlet Angel".
Source: crunchyroll

Masumi`s people have found Maya`s Mother but Masumi decides to keep that information to himself. Maya starts to realize how jealous people are of her success.
Source: crunchyroll

Someone is out to sabotage Maya as so far they have spiked her food, removed bolts from set props and made a bucket of water fall on her.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya`s personal assistant, Norie Otobe, is bullied by Miss Mizuki.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya believes that Hayami Masumi killed her mother, meanwhile Miss Mizuki is worried about Maya`s sudden disappearance.
Source: crunchyroll

Masumi Hayami continues to criticize Maya on her acting abilities.
Source: crunchyroll

Ayumi finds Maya choking on the fake balls of mud from the play.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya performs a solo show to her audience.
Source: crunchyroll

Ayumi Himekawa wins an award for her acting ability.
Source: crunchyroll

Masumi Hayami lectures a small outdoor theater troupe about their play.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Miracle at the Outdoor Ampitheatre

REGULAR.description:
A fundraiser performance by the Tsukikage Acting Troupe and the Ikkakujuu Troupe of "A Midsummer Night`s Dream" was an instant hit! But Maya was cut from the show... what does Masumi Hayami have in store for her?
Source: crunchyroll

Maya reads a story about two princesses, Aldis and Orgeld.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アルディスとオリゲルド

REGULAR.description:
Maya meets an actress who once played Aldis in a play.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya takes the role as Princess Aldis in the play "The Two Princesses"
Source: crunchyroll

The play continues as Maya`s role of Aldis is challenged.
Source: crunchyroll

"The Two Princesses" approaches its final show.
Source: crunchyroll

Maya`s newest play is "The Forgotten Wilderness," in which she plays a girl raised by wolves.
Source: crunchyroll

An open casting call for "The Forgotten Wilderness" brings in some very inexperienced yet eager actors and actresses.
Source: crunchyroll

Getting into her role, Maya travels in to the mountainous wilderness to further understand her character.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Bet To the Drama Arts Festival

REGULAR.description:
"The Forgotten Wilderness" begins rehearsal.
Source: crunchyroll

It`s opening night for "The Forgotten Wilderness" and already a huge line has formed!
Source: crunchyroll

Thirty years have passed since Chigusa Tsukikage, Maya`s mentor, was in the public eye.
Source: crunchyroll

Masumi Hayami runs into Maya on the bullet train station and encourages her to continue pursuing her dream.
Source: crunchyroll

in the countryside, Maya contemplates her life while watching the fire.
Source: crunchyroll

Masumi reads the story of The Scarlet Angel to Maya.
Source: crunchyroll

On her deathbed, Ichiren Ozaki recalls her life
Source: crunchyroll

While crossing an eerie bridge deep in the forest, the bridge suddenly breaks and Maya falls through
Source: crunchyroll

The Scarlet Angel finally reveals herself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: หน้ากากแก้ว
